profile:
The Home Improvement People have completed literally thousands of renovations since our inception. We are a unique award winning contracting company, consulted by various media as industry experts. 
Please view our website at homeimprovementpeople.com to view images of some of our projects. 
For our clients' convenience, we've implemented progress billing as well as financing.
Regardless of scope, we approach every single home renovation with a foundation of strong design aesthetics, comprehensive product options, sound project management, and a commitment to craftsmanship.
 
Our projects range from remodelled bathrooms and kitchens, to rear additions,  hardwood flooring, basements, second story additions and other extensive renovations. We undertake work in all budget ranges.
 
Choosing a reputable contractor is the most important decision you will make regarding your renovation. From plans and permits, to last little finishing details, The Home Improvement People is committed to completing your renovations and home improvements in a professional manner and to your complete satisfaction.
We take pride in our personalized service and our high quality workmanship. 
Call us for quality, insured work - completed on time, and on budget.
416-782-7605.

profile:
P&P General Contractors Inc. is a family owned and operated business with excellent references provided by many satisfied customers.  With more than 15 years of experience and many satisfied customers our company is strongly committed to provide high quality of craftsmanship to each and every customer.

P & P General Contractors Inc. is a licensed company and for our customer's protection we carry both liability and worker's compensation insurance on all our workers and subcontractors.  We are a start to finish company and we stand behind all projects performed and backs them with a full 1 YEAR WARRANTY.

We take pride in our perform, thus our customers can always be assured that only the most experienced and qualified people are serving them.  Our top priority is our customers satisfaction and our teams objective is to transform your renovation wish list into a reality.

profile:
Timeless in style, dependable in performance and exceptional in design, look to Rockstella Stonery to craft the perfect granite, marble or quartz countertop for your home or office. A natural option for kitchen countertops, bathroom vanities and tub surrounds, these materials are also excellent alternatives for fireplaces, bar tops, reception desks and more. We handle all aspects of design, fabrication and installation, and are always prepared to take on a variety of projects, from single vanities to full-scale home installs to multi-unit projects.

***

We distinguish the caliber of our work at Rockstella not just through outstanding craftsmanship and affordable pricing, but more importantly, through an unparalleled level of service. We’ve earned a reputation for being timely, approachable and efficient, and we always plan our consults and installs at a time that suits your schedule – whether it’s business hours, weekends or after hours. It also bears pointing out that we work directly with you – there are no sub-contractors involved – from on-site measuring to individual slab selection to professional installation.

***

At Rockstella Stonery, we like to refer to the unique style and design of our stone options as affordable luxury – an option that will stand out in your home or place of work and that will endure for ages. We’re based in Stoney Creek, and are ready to provide our services to clients throughout Hamilton, Niagara region and GTA.

profile:
If you want QUALITY, CREATIVITY, RELIABILITY, and an overall ENJOYABLE experience, Purple Properties is the company you're looking for! For nearly 24 years now we have grown to understand what is needed in our market space, now allowing us to service happy clients all over the GTA.  

We have enjoyed producing an impressive body of work, lead by the Vision of our clients. The results naturally happen based on our core principles of PASSION, EXCELLENCE, & COMMITMENT. Our work and knowledge base is extremely diverse. We love to use STONE, HORTICULTURE, WOOD, TILES,  PAINTS along with other materials that become our art, your property being the canvas. Whether your project is interior or exterior, we can help! We look forward to co-creating with you in your next project! 

Purple Properties is fully licensed, insured, and up to date with WSIB. Our insurance and license are valid in the GTA for Interior and exterior projects.

profile:
Five times Winner of Best of HomeStars Award
Baeumler Approved Contractor


Demiri Painting & Decorating Services is a Top Rated  Painting company and Home renovation company with years of experience based in Toronto, ON. We serve Toronto as well as surrounding cities including Mississauga, Brampton, Vaughan, Markham, Scarborough and more.

We have over 19 years experience providing quality professional residential and commercial painting services at reasonable prices. We are proud for our reputation for great quality and personal service. Our professional team always works together to ensure a smooth running of job and a high standard of workmanship. Customer satisfaction has been and remains our utmost priority, which is why we we offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee. Our knowledgeable and highly skilled professional painters are trained with minimum 10 years painting experience.

Quality work that is completed on time and within budget, and exceed costumer's expectation, is just the beginning of what we do for our costumer's. Colour is critical when setting the tone and the mood of the home. It is important to select the right colours to ensure continuity and a flow from one area to the next. Demiri experts will work with you to create a paint colour that compliments your home and reflects your personal style.  

Also at Demiri Painting, we can help you with  Home renovations, Condominium renovations, Bathroom renovations, Drywall repair and installation, Stucco repair and removal, Ceilings flattening, Carpentry, Floor installation and much more!

Give us a chance to paint your house, and we guarantee you won't be disappointed.

Why use Demiri painting & decorating to paint your house/office? 

•Two Years Guarantee On All Work Done 
•Full Workers Compensation 
•16+ Years Experience in the Painting Industry 
•Hundreds of Satisfied Clients 
•Top Quality Paints Used including Benjamin Moore, Dulux, Behr, Sherwin Williams, F&B, Ralph Lauren etc 
•Drop sheets to Protect Your Floors and Belongings 
•100% Satisfaction Guaranteed!! 

Interior Painting Services Include: 
•Painting (ie. walls, trim, doors, floors, ceilings, etc.) 
•Staining (ie. banisters, hardwood floors, cabinets, etc.) 
•Faux finishing 
•Stucco Painting and Repair 
•Wallpapering and Removal 
•Drywall Repair and Replacement 
•Plaster 

Exterior Painting Services Include: 
•Painting Exterior Surfaces (ie. windows, brick, doors, eaves, soffits, aluminum siding, etc.) 
•Deck/Fence Staining and Refinishing 
•Power Washing 
•Caulking 

Home Renovations Services includes:
• New build additions
• Kitchen renovations
• Bathroom renovations
• Floor installation
• And much more ...


Your satisfaction is our only goal and we stand behind our work. If you are not 100% satisfied with the quality of our painting, we will work to make it right. We won't leave the job, and you won't be asked to pay until you are pleased with the results. 

Our reputation depends on it.

profile:
We are Ontario’s premier home renovation company. Our experts are passionate about building you the home of your dreams. With over 12 years of industry experience in basement renovations, bathroom renovations, and home-building solutions, we have satisfied hundreds of homeowners. And we’d love to do the same for you for your home renovation.

For all your home renovation needs–whether a bathroom makeover or a basement renovation or Kitchen remodelling, whatever your intentions – we have the know-how to see the job through to success. 

Our team brings the ideas, creativity, and know-how that will make a real difference in your home renovation project, saving you money and finding the perfect combination of style and function.

Founded on basic tenets like fairness and trust, Domilya Group works with you to transform renovation ideas into top-quality results that will leave you with the space you have envisioned. 

Home renovation projects can be stressful, but we take the extra steps to make it hassle-free for you. This becomes possible because of our unique approach, which we feel sets us apart.


Need something installed?  We install it all. All work is done right the first time because we take great pride in our work. 


Redo Your Home Right:

If you need a bathroom, basement, a kitchen or whole home renovations, we provide the materials and know-how.

We know what it takes to protect your home and make it look beautiful. We guarantee all of our work. 


We provide top-notch construction at competitive pricing.

Most of our services are provided to homeowners who want to modernize their residences, such as updating or enlarging an existing kitchen or bathroom, finishing a basement or a complete gut job. We specialize in helping prepare homes for sale and being on time and on budget.   


Home Improvement time is here!
Fast, Friendly, Professional Service with Quality Workmanship. 
Our team will work hard for you to make your renovation dream come true.


We offer:

*Preparing Homes for Sale
*Finishing Basements
*Bathroom & Kitchen Renovations
*Flooring–(Laminate, Hardwood, Carpet and Ceramic, Marble)
*Framing & Taping
*Painting
*Home Remodeling
*Home Renovations
*Electrical & Plumbing (subcontracted to licensed trades-persons)
And much more!


We are geared to delivering specialized home remodeling services to clientele in the Greater Toronto Area, Halton, and Peel Region. Our quality approach and efforts ensure that your renovating project is designed and completed just the way you imagined it.


Let us refurbish your home from top to bottom. 

Here are some examples of the work we do- 
Doors,  Windows, Painting, Backsplash, Kitchen Renovations, Bathroom Renovations, Interior Work, Finishing Basements, Tiles, Faucets & Sinks, Custom Design, Extensions, Drywall, Shower Doors, Drywall Framing, Closet Doors, Shower Enclosures,  Crown Mouldings, General Carpentry, Flooring, Interior Finishing, Floor Leveling, Hardwood, Laminate, Small Renovations, Bathroom Remodeling, Kitchen  Remodeling, Cabinet Installations, Interior Painting, Bathroom Vanities, Laminate Installation, Hardwood Installation, Tub Enclosures, Ceramic, Wall Plastering, Ceiling Painting & Repair, Finishing Basements, Changing Stairs.

profile:
We are a leading company that specializes in Shower Restoration Services and Tile and Grout Cleaning and Repairing

Over time grout surrounding tiles might crack or soften allowing moisture and bacteria to penetrate causing mold, mildew and water problems to occur. 

MOLD, DISCOLOURED GROUT, LOOSE TILES, AND PEALING CAULK/SILICONE are signs that you can't ignore and we are here to help you!

Our Restoration Services will help you avoid future water damage problems and leave your Shower looking brand new again for a fraction of the cost of a full bathroom renovation! 

Email us: fgstileandgrout@gmail.com

profile:
JBG Tile & Contracting Ltd has opened a new flooring showroom selling the best materials from local distributors as well as importing our own line of ceramics. You can now buy your tile from the same company that will install it, one-stop convenient shopping for your renovation project.


Call today for a private appointment with Loreto Scarola to discuss, plan and choose your tile purchase and installation project.


JBGTile & Contracting was chosen as the only floor installer in a Platinum Leadership Energy and Environmental Design (LEED) project in Ontario, an Eco-friendly project that works off the philosophy of promoting green building design, construction, and operations.


Our company is a team of professionals providing and installing quality flooring and ceramics to builders, homeowners and commercial customers alike. 


Our product line includes flooring installation, bathroom renovations, design, leveling subfloors, waterproofing, shower floors, tile repairs, floor/bathroom demolition, backsplashes, levitate office installation service.

profile:
Why choose The Renovators of Canada?  
 
For over the past 20 years our focus on customer experience has helped The Renovators of Canada grow to locations in Durham, Aurora, Stouffville, Markham, Vaughan, Toronto, Hamilton, Guelph, Kitchener, Waterloo, Barrie, Oshawa, Oakville and Cambridge. 
 
Unique to the industry, The Renovators of Canada provides a 10 year warranty on all craftsmanship. This home renovation warranty protection was established to provide peace of mind as home and business owners contemplate renovating a personal or commercial space. 
 
T-ROC is a fully licensed and insured including WSIB. Other affiliations include memberships with the National Kitchen and Bath Association, CARAHS, Better Business Bureau.  
 
We have a proven track record working with our customers with full transparency in every aspect of your project.  Can’t be present all the time during the renovation process?  No worries, we have specialized client software that allows you to see the entire schedule and pictures as the project happens in real time. We care for your home like it’s our own and always conduct ourselves respectfully and professionally.  
 
With our motivated and innovative professionals we will transform your house and make your dream home a reality.  Visit our website at www.trocanada.com

profile:
RM Renovation is a Toronto based renovation company with more than 20 years experience in the field.
.
WE ARE THE TEAM OF PROFESSIONALS WHO PERFORM KITCHEN, BATH OR BASEMENT RENOVATIONS ACCORDING TO YOUR PERSONAL PROJECT.
.
Our major activities are renovating basements, kitchens and bathrooms at reasonable prices. Trusting such works to us our clients have convinced in their quality and fast performing. We provide high-quality construction and renovation services as well as give maximum guarantee for our services. Depending on the project we perform our interior design, wall insulation and finishing.

Our advantages:

Quality and efficiency. We provide preparing and performing works as soon as possible.
Years of experience. We are in the renovation services market for many years and have an excellent reputation and hundreds of grateful customers.
Individual approach. We approach responsibly to perform each order and find the best options for the task as well as advise customers in order to meet all their individual needs.
Highly qualified specialists. We are a team of professionals and perform our work efficiently and reliably. Our employees keep their skills always according to the up to date requirements.
Customers positive reviews. We have a lot of positive feedback from the customers.
.
.
Basement renovation:

Basement in a private house more often perceived as a technical room: storeroom for garden tools or a cellar to store the harvest. Meanwhile, the basement is easy can turn into a full room to organize here, for example, a vinotheque, bar, home theatre or billiard room. The kitchen in the basement is also becoming a very popular modern solution. Construction and repair of the basement or ground floor, of course, will transform your home by adding not only the living space but also personality.

The following work can be done during the basement renovation.

Waterproofing. This is necessary if the moisture on the room walls revealed.

Heating. If the room is designed for staying long (kitchen, library, bathroom), it should be warm enough in any case.

Thermal insulation. This feature will save on heating and prevent heat loss into the ground and it will greatly enhance the energy efficiency of the whole building.

Lighting. If the basement has a small level above the soil it can be equipped with energy-saving windows. Additional electric light point sources using LED lamps will be created as well.

Soundproofing will be installed if the basement room contains equipment that generates big noise (e.g. water pumps etc.).

Water supply and sewerage. These works are performed accordingly to the local water company. Additional pumps can be installed if necessary.

Networks for the power supply, LAN or television can be laid, so it will provide you with maximum comfort.
.
.
Kitchen renovation:

The kitchen is one of the most visited places in your house. That is why it is so important that this room should be cozy and functional. We will do for you all kinds of our works for any areas of the rooms, from small to large ones. These will be the following:

1. Replacing the wires.

2. Aligning the surfaces of the ceiling and walls.

3. Laying the floor and wall tiles.

4. Floor, ceiling and general kitchen equipment installation.

5. Kitchen windows replacement.

6. Home appliances integration.

We always use safe and easy to wash materials.
.
.
Bathrooms renovation:

We are trying to renovate the bathroom as soon as possible because we well know this room is essentially the most important thing in your home. This type of repair involves the following:

1. Initial preparing the room, dismounting the wires, old tiles and plumbing communications.

2. Installation of new wiring, plumbing pipes, risers.

3. Preparing the walls, floor and ceiling.

4. Installation the new door and windows.

5. Installing the tiles on the floor and walls.

6. Installation of the new ceiling and lighting.

7. Installation of new connections to the water supply and sanitation.

8. Installation of all sanitary equipment and electric wash machine if needed.

We work at any time convenient for you. We are looking forward to meeting you!
specialities: Kitchen Renovation; Bathroom Renovation; Basement Renovation; Full House Renovations

profile:
NVG Renovation is a second generation renovation company with over 15 years’ experience.  Our job is not just to build you what you want but also to dig down and make sure you know what you want and all the options which might go with it.  Construction can be an emotional experience for many homeowners and it’s important that after all is said and done that the product exceeds our client’s expectations.

profile:
Gala Renovations was founded with the concept born out of two sound principles: client-centred design and impeccable customer service. Whether your space is wide open with room to imagine, or small and cozy where we have to be creative, we will work with you to ensure that your renovation is completed exactly the way you want it. Our process starts with the ideas and vision you have for your home and moves to our team who will create plans that will guide our craftsmen to build the home of your dreams.


We specialize in complete home, ground and second floor renovations but we also take on other projects like basements, attics, custom kitchens, bathrooms, wall units, and storage solutions. We are flexible and collaborative in our approach and we care about the details that will ultimately beautify your home. At Gala, we leave no stone unturned in the journey from concept to reality. Our passion and knowledge paired with your dwelling and vision, will culminate in a one-of-a kind, unique space that you can proudly call home!

profile:
Finding your perfect home renovation partner can understandably be a daunting process these days. With so many options and potential risks, people are looking for a partner they can trust.

That's why Royal Home Improvements (RHI) retains single-source responsibility from start to finish. Our hand's on approach ensures your needs are met, from concept to construction. Whether architectural design, the quality of construction, or our strict adherence to timelines and budget, RHI guarantees everything we do and make sure that our customers are satisfied with every facet of our work.

Building trust takes years of delivering on time and budget. It requires committed professionals and a refined process model. But ultimately, it's about respect and owning ones word. This hasn't changed since we open our doors in 1969. Proudly serving the Greater Toronto Area, Royal Home Improvements today is one of the largest multi-phased renovators in Canada.

What can we do for you?

profile:
APV Reno are experienced and highly skilled general contractors, home renovation specialists, and painters providing both residential and commercial general contracting needs in Toronto, Downtown Toronto, North York, Mississauga, Etobicoke and GTA areas in Ontario.

We are licensed home renovators & general contractors with over 20 years of successful experience in home renovations, residential & commercial general contracting, and painting. We also work with other professional construction trades across Toronto and the GTA.

APV Reno’s core business is in Design & Renovations. We specialize in home additions, basement renovations, basement finishing, kitchen renovations, bathroom renovations, and general higher-end residential construction.

Other home improvement services include both interior and exterior painting (residential, commercial, and industrial), interior and exterior renovations, as well as fulfilling the procurement process to acquire building permits in the City of Toronto and the GTA.

Our honesty, professionalism and meticulous attention to detail has granted us our success in the cutthroat general contractors and home renovations industry. This has subsequently helped our company build long-term relationships with both clients and contractors, enabling us to steadily grow over the last 20+ years. As a valued client, you can have complete confidence in our work.

Lastly, our integrity in achieving success on every contract or job regardless of how small or large the project, is the core component to our success. All in all, we strive to be a highly reputable and one of the best general contractors in Toronto.

With over 30 years experience, Masonry Doctors are a leading masonry contractor in Toronto. Our services include Chimney Builds & Repairs, Roofing, Guttering, All Masonry Services, Patios, Walkways, Stairs, Steps, Basement & Foundation.

Browse through Masonry Doctors latest masonry, chimney, and concrete projects. Take a look at our recent work and see for yourself the quality of work we provide. Contact us today for a FREE estimate!

Do you need to have your existing outdoor masonry features repaired? Turn to the professionals from Masonry Doctors for all  your masonry restoration needs.

Protect your landscape from the effects of flooding by having custom-designed retaining walls installed by our professionals. Call for your service.

If you love spending time outdoors, a patio is a must-have feature for your home. The team from Masonry Doctors can custom-design a patio for you.

The skilled masons from Masonry Doctors can install decorative stairs for your landscape. We can also repair your damaged steps. Call for more details.

Whether you have damaged concrete or a cracked foundation, the team from Masonry Doctors can repair it for you. Get 15% OFF our services.

Veneer facades and pillars can transform the appearance of any property. Trust us to upgrade your home with quality pillars and columns. Request a call back today!

Rely on the professionals at Masonry Doctors for all of your foundation and basement repair needs. Hire us today and get 15% OFF all our foundation or basement services.

Whether you need chimney rebuilding, repairing, or repointing services, Masonry Doctors does it all. Contact us today for a FREE estimate.

Our experts work with all roofing material and installation types. So, whether your roof is flat or pitched; on a home or commercial property, we are your best choice.

profile:
Kingdom Renovations is a family owned business. Our first priority are our customers. We focus on gaining customer satisfaction through providing great quality, professional service and cost-effective solutions. We offer Residential & Commercial Services in: dry wall, painting, flooring, framing, tiling, plumbing, electrical installations and everything interior.

BATHROOM REMODEL 
Our team is capable of completely installing a fully functioning bathroom. We install all toilets, cabinets, sinks, bathroom tiles, water proofing and plumbing.
​
KITCHEN REMODEL 
Your every kitchen remodel needs will be satisfied by us. We install custom cabinets and can completely redesign your entire kitchen space.

INTERIOR REMODEL 
Any request you may have redesigning your interior space can be accommodated by our hardworking team. From living room to office space, any custom job can be expertly and professionally be done by our team using the best equipment and tools possible.

PAINT
We use our quality paint and tools to give you the best version of your painting needs.

TILE
Our meticulous process ensures your tiles will be tight and precisely installed. No gaps, no worries.

FLOORING 
​Same as our tilework, out flooring is done with high precision to make sure there are no seams and all work is professionally done. We use high-quality tiles to ensure prolonged life of your floors and quality finish on your floors.

POTLIGHTS 
we specialize in Professional Pot lights Installation. indoors, outdoors, residential, commercial and other types of electrical work.

PLUMBING
TRIM
DOORS

profile:
Hello Viewer! 

We offer full turn key solutions for interiors and exterior renovations for a variety of building types. Working at a range of scales, from custom renovation projects for residential market to adaptive reuse of small commercial buildings. The team lists beauty, practicality, and social and environmental sustainability as essentials for ‘healthier and happier buildings’.  


We specialize in the design and renovation management of a variety of spaces which can differ in size and function.  It is through our free consultation that  a picture is painted on what your project and budgetary requirements are.   We will hold your hand as tight as you require and ensure that we listen to your wants and needs.  Once we have a clear picture of scope and budget, our team will estimate and design your space for you accordingly with years of experience and education backing our every decision.   


There is no project to small and no renovation project to large for us to handle.  
-We work with a variety of agents who have clients moving into their new 2 story properties or condos which have very tight time lines.  We have accomplished full 3 story (including basement) renovations in 5 weeks flats when necessary.  
-We have many recurring clients which use our services for each challenge they face.  If you aren't ready to do a full project in a single swing,  we can help you break down the project into proper stepping stones to spend where necessary and when necessary. 


We are a phone call or email away and would be honored to work with you.

profile:
Welcome to ZAFCON INC your professional expert contractor. 

WHO WE ARE
Our company team consist of project managers, engineers, designers, construction and renovation specialists who are experts in their field. This team has worked successfully together to help our customers achieve their construction objective and dream renovations.

OUR CORE VALUES

Safety - We are commitment to safety to ensure everyone can return to their loved ones at the end of the day. As a result, we ensure all team members and all work is in compliance with safety regulations,  WSIB and Covid-19 protocols.

Quality - Quality distinguishes best from the rest. Our craftsmanship approach ensures that all of our clients receive nothing but the best quality service.

Integrity - We don't take the convenient approach but rather the RIGHT one, even if no one is watching.  

Transparency - The most important core value for us is to ensure our customers receive clear terms and conditions upfront. This will help us build long lasting relationships which further fosters our team culture across all levels of skills and management. 

Services we offer:

Full Home Renovations
Home Extensions and Upgrades
Basement Renovations
Kitchen & Bathroom Renovations

Check out our website for more pictures and to get an estimates on your next project or simply call us to discuss what is possible (647) 785-2929

 We are open for business and we are following all Covid-19 regulations.

profile:
OUR PROCESS

 

When working with GTCC, you will have access to knowledgeable professionals working cohesively to provide you with a finished product you can be proud of for years to come. We will provide honest answers and insights to any questions or querries you have throughout the process.

First, you will start with a free consultation and estimate. This is where we will go over all of your options and approximate budgets. If you're seeking help with a smaller renovation (kitchen, bathroom, basement), we will provide you a fixed price in this phase.

Should you decide to move forward with us for a custom home addition design paclage, you will then move into the design phase. This is where you will meet with our architects and designers and together come up with a uniquely custom-tailored plan for your new custom renovation or addition.

Once we have engineered drawings for your project, we will then cost the project based on these approved drawings and provide you with a fixed price to execute the work in a timely fashion.

When we have agreed on the scope of work and price the real planning for us begins. We will provide you a project schedule and approximate start and completion date. Product will be ordered and we will be on our way.

Throughout the construction phase of the project, we will be in constant contact with you. We will keep you apprised of any pertinent information regarding your project through email and set weekly meetings.

When the work is complete, we will do a final walkthrough to discuss any potential deficiencies that must be fixed (on our dollar) and hand over the keys to your new home.

profile: We are a broad spectrum Construction Company that started as a painting company and grew into general construction company, specialising in all of interior renovations / remodeling. We are serving all of Ontario for over 10 years. We have been performing different works in Luxuries Hotels, Residential Homes, Custom Homes, Occupied/Vacant Apartment Buildings, Offices, Restoring Fire Hydrants, Large cargo containers etc. We serve Provincial and Federal Governments, Regional Municipalities, Institutions, Developers, Privet Home Owners, Builders and so on. Our customers are: Defence Contraction Canada, County Of Lambton, Kingston & Frontenac Housing Corporation, Region of Waterloo etc. Working in multimillion custom homes requires a very high standard of workmanship, which we possess and successfully apply on all of our projects. We are very flexible company and can always accommodate extra work, and accelerate if needed to finish ahead of schedule. We have very qualified personal with very diverse working experience which in turn makes our company very adaptive to non-standard tasks.

profile:
WELCOME TO ZGGLTD
Located in Mississauga, Ontario and Big Sky, Montana ZGGLTD is a trusted name in commercial and residential architectural millwork installation and has been known by many for our quality installation, attention to detail, reliability and commitment to customer satisfaction.
ZGGLTD was founded in 2009 by Fadil Selimi with more than 30 years experienced in woodworking trades in shop and installation. 

As 2021 we are member in a good standing of AWMAC Ontario Chapter.

WHY CHOOSE US

ZGGLTD offers a wide range of professional architectural millwork installation services for commercial, properties across Canada and USA. The team of experienced millwork professional installers at ZGGLTD are standing by to serve your needs and make your business stand out with quality woodwork.

As a company ZGGLTD is focused on providing a higher level of services and support to meet and exceed your every expectation. Choosing ZGGLTD for your next project and you can rest assured that you will receive outstanding quality architectural millwork installation.

Here at ZGGLTD we have made it our mission to be the leading company for commercial architectural millwork installation, while maintaining integrity and professionalism by providing high-quality services at competitive prices. This means that we are committed to becoming the company you call when you want professional installation, knowledgeable advice, and a team who will listen and respond to your needs installation with every project.

profile:
Reno-building is a licensed Ontario-based design-build-renovation contractor established in 2017 that services to the Greater Toronto Area (GTA). Reno-building is a fully insured, licensed and WSIB compliant company which provides Architecture, General Contracting, Construction Management and Build to serve Residential, Retailers, Medical professionals, Commercial and Industrial clients. Reno-building has a strong quality culture, a professional and experienced team, and industry-leading efficiencies.
Mission:

Offer value-added renovation at a competitive rate, honest service

while responsible for quality and always looking for innovation.
Vision:

Leading renovation company in the GTA.

 
Values:

We do what we say we will do.

We achieve value-added results.

We are constantly focused on our job.

We are committed to continuous learning and excellence.

 

Reno Building is a qualified, experienced and trusted renovation company that excels in all aspects of the industry. Reno building renovates everything from residential house to multi-unit, commercial and industrial facilities, followed by complete site architecture and modelling. Satisfied repeat clientele and their referrals have brought Reno Building to where it is today. Our renovation project portfolio showcases the depth of our knowledge and skill in the industry, spanning projects large and small in the commercial, industrial, health care and residential sectors.

profile:
Prof Line is a renovation and remodeling company that specializes in basement finishing, kitchens and bathrooms.

Our project starts by meeting our client, visiting the site and provide a quote for the cost of the project. 

Upon agreement, we provide the client with a project schedule. We keep our client updated throughout the process.

Our team consists of project managers, construction managers and craftsmen who play important role in project execution.

Clients continue to choose us because of our experience and the great value we provide. 

Beginning in preconstruction, we take an integrated approach that supports the design phase allowing a seamless transition from the conceptual phase into construction phase.

Give us a call - 437-985-7771

We Invite You To Explore What Rosewood Kitchens Has To Offer!

profile:
My name is Dave LoDuca. I have been installing tiles since 1985. I started working for a company called Metric Tile. My duties were to install tile on new construction for many different builders. I worked for the company from 1985 to 1996 before I opened my own tile store in Georgetown, ON.  I now specialize mainly in bathroom renovations to help beautify residential bathroom spaces.  We operate with 2 vans to service our clients.  My company has been voted Most Favourite Contractor from 2012 to 2018 in Georgetown. Our goals are to complete perfect bathrooms as per the customers specifications. We use all the latest tools and technology.  

We look forward to hearing from you!

profile:
ABOUT US
 
Contact us for a free consultation or estimate today!
Ultimate Kitchen and Bath Renovation is made up of top-rated Trades and Designers. We render services to home and business owners throughout the Greater Toronto Area (GTA). For over 20 years, we have provided a full spectrum of services to our clients including complete home renovation and business restoration, kitchen redecoration, bathroom remodelling, and basement finishing , as well as, tile and hardwood flooring, electrical and plumbing services, countertops and appliance installations, and customized carpentry and painting services at a reasonable and affordable prices. We are also one of the leading manufacturer of kitchen cabinets and supplier of bathroom and flooring products in the GTA; Making us a one stop shop for any home or business renovation project.
Our clients' renovation needs and desires are our priority. We are committed to work for them to create a truly client-focused experience. Our goal is to insure that our clients' renovation needs and goals are realized within their set financial budget and timelines. As a result, we open the lines of on-going communication and actively listen to our clients' renovation ideas and concerns while paying a close attention to their personal tastes and styles to ensure that the work is completed successfully the first time.
Our distinctive approach to working closely and building relationship with our clients, our highest quality workmanship, our tenacious project management, as well as, our premium products and materials, our dedicated attention to details, and our care for craftsmanship has lead to countless successful projects execution. At the Ultimate Kitchen and Bath Renovation, we seek to guarantee our clients' satisfaction and to fulfill their needs with every project we undertake.
Let our experience and knowledge work for you. Regardless of your project size, we can guarantee your complete satisfaction in every stage of your renovation process. Contact us today to schedule a free consultation and to get a free estimate on your renovation project.
Our goal is your satisfaction.
 
KITCHEN RENOVATION
 
With the changes in Canadians' lifestyles and the structure of today's family, kitchens are more than just a place to cook. It is the heart of the modern home, a focal point of everyday life and entertainment. As the central hub of the home, kitchen renovations are one of the greatest renovation investments. A practical, functional, and aesthetically pleasant kitchen can add up to 30% to the value of a home or business.
 
The degree of customization homeowners' and business owners' desire for their kitchen can effortlessly be attained with our custom cabinetry and our wide selection of finishing materials. From Modern to Traditional styles, from solid wood to MDF cabinets, and from granite to marble countertops, our clients are rest assured that we have the impeccable products and services to suit their kitchen's interior design that they were hoping to achieve from their renovating project.
 
It is possible to have a modern day kitchen that you were hoping for all these years. It only takes the vast knowledge and experience of our kitchen renovation experts to map out a customized plan for you that encompasses a variety of design elements that best compliments your renovation needs and budget, as well as, your existing kitchen space and layouts. Contact us today to schedule your free consultation and get a free estimate on transforming your kitchen into your customized retreat.

Visit our showroom at 2165 Buckingham Road, Unit 3, Oakville, Ont, L6H 0W7

profile:
Welcome TC Contracting 

We offer many Services:

Retaining walls: TC Contracting are specialist in Armour stone, interlock and Pre cast concrete retaining walls.  Whether its aesthetic, or structural  needs, TC Contracting has the skills and knowledge to complete the task. Contact us with your ideas and watch us bring them to reality. 

Full Landscaping , Interlock, Concrete: We know you work hard to see your dream property come to reality. Here at TC, we will work with you to make sure the job is done properly and in a timely matter

Fencing: To dig and set post to complete fencing jobs. From 10 feet to a 1000 feet .  TC has the capabilities to finish your project. Many different fencing designs available, contact us to get started 
Decks: There are many options when it comes to decks IE: Wood type, railings, Steps, Levels ECT. Let TC Contracting's team help you figure out which options are suited best for you!  

Excavation and Trenching: Are you looking for a trusted contractor to excavate your next  project? There are many laws and regulations surrounding excavating and digging. Let us explain what needs to be done and leave it with TC so you are confident  that your job is being done right.  Each and every time!

Gravel Driveways and Sodding: Looking to give your property a beautiful new look? TC Contracting are experts at gravel driveways and sod. We work with our partners to guarantee the best materials at the best prices.

services:
Basement Renovations
B&B design offers many options to customers in order to ensure that the job is done to code. We recommend inspections for plumbing and electrical work, as well as city permits. B&b is committed to making the customers dream a reality by educating and being realistic about the work they want done.

Bathroom Renovations
Bathroom designs come in many shapes and forms. The most important step b&b recommends about renovating bathrooms is to ensure that the room is mold and water proofed. B&B highly recommends schluter products for all of these needs.

Kitchen Renovations
B&b provides engineers and design consultants to help bring a customers thought into reality. B&b takes pride in properly utilizating all of the space available. B&b provides an array of designs and countertops for competitive pricing to make sure each customer get something beautiful and unique.

Bianka Design&Build is a full service design and remodeling firm serving Great Toronto Area. Providing complete kitchen and bathroom remodeling, Bianka Design&Build has everything you need from design and supply to installation. We strive to deliver the best in high-value services at the right price for you.

At Bianka Design&Build, we are equal parts builder and designer. Whether you’re looking for modern, traditional, contemporary, rustic or any style in between, our team of interior designers will work with you to identify the look that’s right for your space while our builders execute that plan to create a look that corresponds to your individual taste. Our mission is to provide the highest level of service and quality. There’s not a single design challenge or building constraint that our builders can’t overcome or find a solution for. We treat each remodeling project with the same care we’d want for ourselves, and we’re committed to creating spaces that look and feel the way our clients envision.

profile:
Get to Know Us
Our team here at Best Bath Renovations utilizes a collective, personalized approach to bathroom renovation projects. We accomplish this by working closely with our clients to ensure that they get everything they desire upon completion of their new bathroom.

We don’t come to you with our plan; instead our bathroom designers work within your vision, and make that come to fruition. Our interior design service is unique due to the diverse, personalized approach we offer to all of our customers.

If you desire for vanities placed in certain sections, luxurious cabinets installed, or walls broken down to expand your space, fluorescent lighting implemented, energy efficient window solutions, different flooring put in, or our specialty, have floor-level showers built into your restroom — then we’ll be able to help.

Whether you want minor fixtures installed, or you desire a complete custom bathroom remodeling service, no project is too small or too big for us to complete.


   
Meet the Boss
Andre Terlecki has worked in the Canadian Home and Renovation industry for over 26 years, starting out as a custom homebuilder. He has been privileged to work with a plethora of architects, designers and engineers as a homebuilder. Mr. Terlecki has shown that he a man committed to improving his craft, even spending some time in Europe honing his skills in the field of custom cabinet making.

In more recent years, Mr. Terlecki realized his passion was in bathroom renovations, and elected to focus his efforts solely within that sector. Through that transition, Best Bath Renovations was birth, and infused with it were ideals of detailed, and personalized remodeling work.

With the help of his excellent team of contractors at Best Bath Renovations, Andre Terlecki has provided the Greater Toronto Area with excellent Bathroom Remodeling Services, with a specialization in floor-level, and barrier-free showers.

Haus Renovation Group is a team of licensed and insured professionals with years of experience under their belt operating in the Greater Toronto Area and the nearby municipalities. 

As a company that prioritizes client satisfaction we do not shy away from honest conversations regarding the work to be done. You should never expect to see costs not discussed prior to the start of a project. At the same time however, we stay flexible for any adjustments you may choose to make. profile:
At ARTECO, we make dreams a reality by ensuring quality craftsmanship that is safe and stands the test of time. Our team of diverse professionals pride themselves on their ability, efficiency, and commitment to professional development. Each and every one of our team members are carefully selected for their remarkable work ethic and excellent artistry which, adheres to our company’s standards for superior client safety and satisfaction.
 
CLIENTS
We strive to meet and exceed our client’s expectations to foster long term partnerships.
EMPLOYEES
We value our staff and create an enjoyable work environment which allows personal fulfillment that leads to a loyal and productive work force.
TRADES
We treat our sub-trades and suppliers with respect to cultivate a team approach where experience is applied with dedicated enthusiasm.
THE COMPANY
We use value engineering, effective construction practices and hard work to deliver.
 
Mission Statement
 
To deliver high-quality, cost effective projects on schedule by employing and supporting motivated, flexible, and focused teams. We value the importance of our relationships and will continue to remain fair and true in our dealings with all employees, clients, vendors, and partners. Our clients count on our dependability, our drive, and our integrity. We take great pride in our accomplishments and build on them every day.
 
At ARTECO, we as a team understand that a renovation process can be stressful and intimidating. As such, we promise to take the stresses and pressures of a renovation project away and produce safe and secure spaces for our valuable clients to love and enjoy.
 
Our Vision
 
Our spaces should inspire us to go out into the world and do great things. At ARETCO, our vision is to continue being efficient while working in an ethical and balanced manner to earn the privilege of being the General Contractor of choice.
 
 
 
What makes ARTECO different?
 
• Our superior customer service to each and every single one of our clients
• Our commitment to consistent and fast communication through phone and email
• Our collaborative approach with clients
• Our top of the line industry standard products and materials
• Our use of latest techniques and technology
• Our commitment to a seamless and headache free renovation process

profile:
Focused on our customers, we provide excellent service - always answering your phone calls and responding. We focus on high quality workmanship, always looking to give our customers that 10/10 experience. No matter your project, big or small - call us and talk! We love to hear your ideas and tell you how we can make it a reality.

Since starting out in 2013, Genassy Construction has built and continues to grow a loyal customer base. Our steady repeat business has been based on a simple business philosophy: Be Trustworthy, Have Great Workmanship

Home Renovations are challenging, so it's important to know that you can depend on your contractor from start to finish. Genassy Construction focuses on crafting high quality kitchens, bathrooms, and basements.

With an army of skilled tradesmen, we can handle any job. It is our goal to consistently exceed your expectations.

profile:
Residential/Commercial renovation and handyman services for any project.

Our Services are available:
- Anywhere in the GTA
- Anytime of the day or week
- Fully Insured (up to for $5,000,000) and Licensed 
- Always Punctual, Detailed and Professional

Our Past Projects Included:
- Full Home Renovation
- Kitchen and Bathroom Remodelling
- Millwork and Carpentry
- Waterproofing and Tiling
- Plumbing (Performed by licensed Plumber)
- Electrical Work (Performed by licensed Electrician)
- Drywall, Taping and Sanding
- Framing and Insulation
- Painting and Staining
- HVAC
- Landscaping
- Other 

Please contact us for a free estimate and chance to discuss your project details. You will receive a detailed breakdown of the costs, timelines and a walk through all aspects of any job. The estimate will cost you nothing, but it will give you a chance to assess our qualifications better than any add can.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Mirrors & Glass
 
Glass has become a dominant element of contemporary Residential and Commercial interior design.  Precision Glass has made unique glass installations projects our prime area of expertise with a wide range of experience working with top interior designers and architects.
 
We approach each project with an eye towards achieving a higher level of implementation in glass design and effect.  Designs that look fantastic on paper demand solid experience to make them real.  Precision Glass offers you exactly that level of experience.  
 
We do everything from:
 
Frameless Glass Shower Enclosures
Shower Doors
Glass Hand / Guard Rails
Back Painted Glass ( Kitchen Backsplash)
Custom Mirrors
Glass Partitions 
and more.........

profile:
Welcome to the home of Toronto's oldest condominium refurbishment contractor (founded in 1972), 

Request a complimentary (non-pushy, value-focused) personal consultation to explore possibility around your upcoming refurbishment project by calling (905) 944-1385 during business hours, or completing the form on this page.

During your complimentary refurbishment consultation, we’ll help you with some of the more important elements of your planning, design and build process, including:

✓ Durable material options.
✓ Efficient project workflows.
✓ Budget saving opportunities.
✓ Approximate timelines.
✓ Common mistakes to avoid.
✓ Best practices for minimal disruptions.

And more!

Need a Build Quote?
If you've already got a world-class design ready to go and are looking for a quote to bring it to life, let's talk details and get you some numbers.

In a Tight Spot & Need a Repair?
Do you have some water, drywall, wall covering, flooring, wall or ceiling damage needing some immediate TLC? We can help.

profile:
KBB restoration is your source for Bathroom renovation in Toronto as well as Bathtub reglazing & Surfacing

Are you looking to give your home an updated look? Have you been considering the installation of new kitchen cabinets or perhaps a total bathroom refinishing? If you are ready to improve the look of your home, then KB&B Restorations can help you realize your remodeling dreams. KB&B Restorations has been providing a host of restoration and renovation services in the Toronto area and the surrounding including Thornhill, Newmarket, and Aurorafor many years. KB&B Restorations has the experience to help you remodel any part of your home. We have a team of experienced contractors that work diligently to ensure that your project is completed in a timely and efficient manner. 

KB&B Restorations is known for providing excellent craftsmanship. Our customers know that they can count on us when they want a job done right. We have helped people remodel all areas of their homes. From bathrooms to kitchens, KB&B Restorations is the go to company for any type of remodeling job including Kitchen renovation, Bathroom renovation, Countertop resurfacing, Bathtub resurfacing & reglazing, Ceramic tiles. Whatever fits your budget; KB&B Restorations is there to help with all of your renovation needs.

profile:
Mrbasements will inspect your basement, work directly with your design and schedule and build your dream basement within your budget. Using progressive 3D renderings showing you what your basement will look like even before the first baseboard is installed, you have the power to choose exactly what you want (and don’t want) installed.

MrBasements gives highly rated basement renovations across the GTA.

All our staff are well trained and certified so you can feel assured you’re getting the best service possible.
We offer the ability to finance so that you can avoid the upfront payment. 

Our workmanship is covered by standard warranties that enable us to protect your investment and work only with permits and independent municipal inspectors.
We don’t just update your basement for looks, we also account for the longevity of your basement, ensuring that it will last for many years to come.

profile:
Bianka Design&Build is a full service design and remodeling firm serving Great Toronto Area. Providing complete kitchen and bathroom remodeling, Bianka Design&Build has everything you need from design and supply to installation. We strive to deliver the best in high-value services at the right price for you.

At Bianka Design&Build, we are equal parts builder and designer. Whether you’re looking for modern, traditional, contemporary, rustic or any style in between, our team of interior designers will work with you to identify the look that’s right for your space while our builders execute that plan to create a look that corresponds to your individual taste. Our mission is to provide the highest level of service and quality. There’s not a single design challenge or building constraint that our builders can’t overcome or find a solution for. We treat each remodeling project with the same care we’d want for ourselves, and we’re committed to creating spaces that look and feel the way our clients envision.

profile: Renovators Group is all about building you a home you love. We specialize in renovating bathrooms, kitchens, basements and home additions. In your outside space, we create and build deck that make sense for your space. Renovators Group offers a solution which is a contract system that ensures you, the homeowner, is in control of your budget and that you have complete transparency during your project. Our specialized client software provides access to your job schedule, daily logs from the team, pictures and more. Communication is of utmost importance when go through a renovation and you can be confident in knowing that we stand by this principle. Contact us for more information.
